com.google.wave.api.event
Class WaveletCreatedEvent

java.lang.Object
  com.google.wave.api.event.AbstractEvent
      com.google.wave.api.event.WaveletCreatedEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Event
public class WaveletCreatedEvent
extends AbstractEvent

Event triggered when a new wavelet is created. This event is only triggered if the robot creates a new wavelet and can be used to initialize the newly created wave. Wavelets created by other participants remain invisible to the robot until the robot is added to the wave in which case WaveletSelfAddedEvent is triggered.

Constructor.

Parameters:
wavelet - the wavelet in which this event was triggered.
bundle - the message bundle this event belongs to.
modifiedBy - the id of the participant that triggered this event.
timestamp - the timestamp of this event.
rootBlipId - the root blip id of the new wavelet.
message - the message that was passed into the wavelet create operation.
waveId - the id of the new wave.
waveletId - the id of the new wavelet.
